HoverEnabled.Name: Hover Enabled
HoverEnabled.Hint: Display the note in a tooltip when the token is hovered over.

DisplayImages.Name: Display Images
DisplayImages.Hint: Display images contained in token notes.

OwnershipPermissionsRequired.Name: Ownership Permissions Required
OwnershipPermissionsRequired.Hint: Token ownership permissions required to view the notes.

TooltipPlacement.Name: Tooltip Placement
TooltipPlacement.Hint: Placement of tooltip relative to the token.

TooltipScreenPosition.Name: Position of Note on Screen
TooltipScreenPosition.Hint: Set the location of the note on the screen.

SmartPlacement.Name: Tooltip Smart Placement
SmartPlacement.Hint: Dynamic placement of the tooltips to stay inside the browser viewport.

TooltipOpenDelay.Name: Tooltip Open Delay
TooltipOpenDelay.Hint: Length of delay before the token note tooltip appears (in milliseconds).

TooltipCloseDelay.Name: Tooltip Close Delay
TooltipCloseDelay.Hint: Length of delay before the token note tooltip closes (in milliseconds).

TooltipColor.Name: Tooltip Theme
TooltipColor.Hint: The color theme of the token note tooltip. `System` will use the game system theme.

FontSize.Name: Text Size
FontSize.Hint: The base text size for the token note display. Use 'rem' or 'px' units.

MaxWidth.Name: Maximum Width
MaxWidth.Hint: The maximum width in px the token note display can grow to before it will force wrapping.

UseMousePositionForCoordinates.Name: Use Mouse Position for Tooltip Coordinates
UseMousePositionForCoordinates.Hint: Use mouse position to display the tooltip
